name: Winford Wealth
headline: The Leading AI Meeting Assistant for Financial Advisors
description: Winford Wealth empowers financial advisors to enhance client experiences with an AI Meeting Assistant. Our platform automates notetaking, seamlessly integrates with your CRM and tech stack, and delivers unique analytics to help you work smarter.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:finance; industry:workflow-automation; industry:productivity; industry:enterprise-software; location:new-york

founders.name: Jacob Tucker, Co-Founder, CEO
founders.description: Jacob Tucker was one of the first investment analysts hired to work on the BCRED product at Blackstone, which revolutionized access to alternative investments for individual and private wealth investors. He received an M.S. in Computer Science and B.A. in Economics from The University of Chicago.

founders.name: Rohan Prashant, Co-Founder, CTO
founders.description: Rohan is building Winford Wealth, helping financial advisors save weeks per year. He was previously a Software Engineer at Microsoft and studied Computer Science at the University of Michigan (Go Blue!).

# The AI Meeting Assistant forYour Financial Advisory Practice
Eliminate note-taking. Save time preparing for client meetings. Get insights to improve your client's experience. 
![Backed by Y Combinator](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FWhiteYC.png&w=828&q=100)
Book a Demo
Your browser does not support the video tag.
### Your AI-Powered Notetaker for In-Person and Video Calls Ensures You Never Miss a Client Detail from Your Meetings Again
## Your Assistant in Action:
### Meeting Prep
Enhance client meeting prep by leveraging an AI-powered history of past client interactions
![Client Meeting Prep](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FClient%20Overview%20Landing%20Page.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Client Analytics
Track your client's questions. Get participation data. Review sentiment analysis.
![Meeting Insights](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FMeeting%20Insights%202.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Follow-Up Emails
Instantly generate wealth management-tailored follow up emails configured to your team's style.
![Follow-Up Emails](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FFollow%20Up%20Emails%20Landing%20Page.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Integrate Your Existing Tools
Automatically update your CRM, and sync with your existing technology providers.
![Portfolio Monitoring](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FWinford%20Integrations%20Screenshot%202.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Meeting Prep
Enhance client meeting prep by leveraging an AI-powered history of past client interactions
![Client Meeting Prep](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FClient%20Overview%20Landing%20Page.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Client Analytics
Track your client's questions. Get participation data. Review sentiment analysis.
![Meeting Insights](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FMeeting%20Insights%202.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Follow-Up Emails
Instantly generate wealth management-tailored follow up emails configured to your team's style.
![Follow-Up Emails](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FFollow%20Up%20Emails%20Landing%20Page.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Integrate Your Existing Tools
Automatically update your CRM, and sync with your existing technology providers.
![Portfolio Monitoring](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FWinford%20Integrations%20Screenshot%202.png&w=2048&q=75)
## Achieve More with Your AI-Powered Toolkit
Maximize your team's productivity, gain differentiated perspectives, and unlock new opportunities with our industry-specific solutions.
### Save Yourself 7 Weeks per Year
Dramatically decrease operational burden associated with client meeting preparation and follow up actions.
### Perfect Your Meetings
Focus 100% of your efforts on being present with your clients, rather than worrying about note-taking.
### Differentiate Your Practice With Unique Data
Leverage unique meeting insights to unlock new ways to understand your client's needs.
## F.A.Q.
### Why are You Right for Winford?
Winford was built with an advisor-first mindset, understanding the unique challenges financial advisors face. While generic providers focus mainly on transcripts, our mission is to focus on features most important to advisors while also prioritizing your client's experience.
### How Quickly is Winford Implemented?
Onboarding can be done through a self-service link after reaching out to our team in under 10 minutes, and syncs automatically to leading industry providers. We are happy to provide complimentary hands-on onboarding to support specific needs.
### How does pricing work?
Check out more detail on our pricing in [this article](https://winfordwealth.com/</insights/pricing-tier-guide>). For firms with under 10 advisors, pricing is $40/month per advisor and includes unlimited customizations.
### How does Winford Protect Your Data?
We do not train models on your data. Data from each client is stored separately and is only accessible by a particular advisor. Recordings are deleted instantaneously after calls are processed, and client detail can be configured to be deleted from the system automatically. Read more [here](https://winfordwealth.com/</insights/data-security>)!
### Backed by Global Leaders
![Y Combinator](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FWhiteYC.png&w=384&q=75)![AWS Startups](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2Faws%20startups%20picture.png&w=384&q=75)![Microsoft for Startups](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2FMicrosoft-for-Startups%20picture.png&w=384&q=75)
### Built by Industry Experts
Built by a team of investment professionals, leading AI engineers, and cybersecurity specialists, ensuring the highest standards.
![Bespoke Approach](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2Fbespoke.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
## Our Bespoke Approach
We know your firm has unique processes, materials, and goals. We excel in creating customized solutions for you that integrate with existing experiences, improving outcomes without impacting your established procedures. We also can provide you with out-of-the-box tools for immediate use. Learn more about how we can tailor solutions to a wide variety of needs in [this article](https://winfordwealth.com/</insights/unlocking-potential>)!
![Security](https://winfordwealth.com/_next/image?url=%2Fsecurity.jpg&w=1920&q=75)
## Built With Security At Our Core
We know the security of your data is of the utmost importance. We've built our platform to meet the highest security standards. All data on our platform is encrypted in transit and at rest, in line with industry standard protocols. Our engineering team is on call 24/7/365 in the event of any security-related concerns. Check out more detail on how we protect you in [this article](https://winfordwealth.com/</insights/data-security>).
## Get Started with a 30 Day Free Trial
Be the first in line to get access to our newest suite of features. Please fill out the form, and we'll be in touch shortly with information on how to book a demo and gain access to our platform.
SUBMIT

generated_description:
Winford Wealth is a promising startup based in New York that launched in 2024, emerging from Y Combinator's Batch S24. Their mission? To be the leading AI meeting assistant specifically designed for financial advisors. 

The core of their offering is an intelligent platform that aims to transform how financial advisors engage with their clients. By automating the nitty-gritty of notetaking, they allow advisors to focus on what truly matters: enhancing client relationships. What stands out is Winford's seamless integration with existing CRM systems and other technologies, which helps advisors not just save time, but also gain valuable insights through unique analytics on client interactions.

Here's how it works in practice:

- **Meeting Preparation**: Advisors benefit from AI-driven histories of past client interactions, making prep more efficient.
- **Client Analytics**: It offers tracking of client questions, interaction levels, and even sentiment analysis, providing tools to fine-tune client engagement strategies.
- **Follow-Up Emails**: The platform generates personalized follow-up emails tailored to each client's style and needs, something that can often be a tedious manual process.
- **Integration**: Winford integrates effortlessly with existing tech stacks, ensuring that valuable time isn't wasted on manually updating systems.

With a dedicated team of three and guidance from notable entrepreneur Tom Blomfield, Winford Wealth is poised to innovate the advisory landscape significantly. They've even claimed that their service can save advisors up to 7 weeks a year by cutting down the operational burden associated with client meetings. 

Data security is a priority for Winford; they emphasize that client data is kept secure, separate, and inaccessible to anyone other than the respective advisor. Their approach combines cutting-edge AI with a strong understanding of the financial advisory sector, ensuring they are built for advisors, by advisors.

If you're in the world of finance and looking to elevate your practice with a little help from AI, Winford Wealth might just be the next step. You can find more about them on their website: [winfordwealth.com](https://winfordwealth.com).
